title: Leading cigarette brands in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2016 , by sales value
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Sales value in million GBP in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Sales value in million GBP 1511.3 is found at Month Sterling and the minimum is found at Windsor where Month is 461.9.
Month Windsor has 3.27 times less Sales value in million GBP than Month Sterling which is the highest.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Sales value in million GBP in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Sales value in million GBP 1511.3 is found at Month Sterling and the minimum is found at Windsor where Month is 461.9.

The maximum Sales value in million GBP 1511.3 is found at Month Sterling and the minimum is found at Windsor where Month is 461.9.

max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Sales value in million GBP in each Month on the y axis.
The Sales value in million GBP is highest at Month Sterling and lowest at Month Windsor.
Second maximum Sales value in million GBP is found at Month Mayfair.
The difference of Sales value in million GBP between the highest and lowest Month is 1049.4.
Month Sterling is higher than any other Months with value 1511.3, followed by Mayfair, and Lambert and Butler. Down to Month Windsor with the lowest value 461.9.
Over the past 10 Months, the Sales value in million GBP has lowered.
Considered together, the average Sales value in million GBP in all 10 Months is roughly 775.37.
Summing up the values of all Months, we get total 7753.7.
